patterns: What do you know about the college?
What is the name of the college?
May I know more about the college?
How can I know about your college?
responses: National Institute of Technology,Andhra Pradesh (NIT-AP) is an engineering college established in the year 2015 in Tadepalligudem, West Godavari,Andhra Pradesh State, India.National Institute of Technology, Andhra Pradesh is the 31st institution among the chain of NITs started by the Government of India.he campus is located in Tadepalligudem, spread over an area of 178 acres.

patterns: What is the student portal of NITAP?
Where can I find student login ?
responses: The Student portal of NITAP is https://www.nitandhra.ac.in/student/auth/login. You'll get more in it where initially you have to create an account and have to log in the portal.

patterns: where can i get transport details?
responses: Students have no permission to use bikes or motorcycles in the campus and they are only  allowed to use cycles in the campus and there is no bus facility in the campus as of now.

responses: College classes start from 9 AM to 5 PM(Mon to Fri).Classes are held according to your department's timetable tentatively.

patterns: is ragging practice active in college
does college have any antiragging facility
responses: We are Proud to tell you that our college provides ragging free environment.The institution safeguards new entrants from the threat of ragging. An Anti-Ragging Cell has been established by the Institute in this regard. The institution's head oversees the cell together with a number of other senior faculty members that serve on the committee.

patterns: tell me about your college mess.
What kind of booka are avaliable in your library
responses: NIT-AP has strong infrastructure that offers students access to central library with all of their academic resources,seperate hostels for boys and girls with one mess for the girls and two for the boys as well as other necessary amenities,Furthermore, it provides classrooms as well as course-based laboratories such as Chemical Technology lab, Engineering Geology lab, Data Structure lab and many more to give adequate resources.
For more information please refer
